entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
